name: Idle SpaceTime
description:
Expand your civilization by travelling the void between your world and others. Collect resources, upgrade mines, factories, sun power generators and much more.

Game is very much work in progress as had only less than half of the jam time to actually do game stuff.

This game is inspired much by Idle kingdom clicker.

Background sky boxes from Unity Assets. https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/skybox-volume-2-nebula-3392
